name: Borjiko's Adventure - The World Cuisine Saga
name_original: Borjiko's Adventure - The World Cuisine Saga
description:
Download Borjiko's Adventure – The World Cuisine Saga now for free!

Borjiko's Adventure – The World Cuisine Saga is a brand new game in match 3 Category. Match three or more ingredients and collect them to cook tasty dishes from different countries and cultures all around the world.

Collect stars based on your performance on each level and unlock new countries for Borjiko to fly on his magic balloon.

You can even vote for your own country and we'll do our best to put your country and your flavourful dishes in our next updates.

It's a perfect food puzzler.

Borjiko's Adventure – The World Cuisine Saga features:

  • Made with love & care
  • Amazing graphics and gameplay
  • Admirable music and SFX
  • Hundreds of different delectable dishes and ingredients from different countries
  • Easy and fun to play, challenging to master
  • Hundreds of levels and more added every month
  • Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected with Facebook

    • Borjiko's Adventure – The World Cuisine Saga is completely free to play, but you can buy extra coins to use different boosters in your journey around the world.

    Last but not least, a big LOVE and THANK YOU goes to everyone who played Borjiko's Adventure – The World Cuisine Saga!
